front.title: A Security Design for RPL: IPv6 Routing Protocol for Low Power and Lossy Networks

abstract.t: This document presents a security design for RPL: IPv6 Routing Protocol for Low Power and Lossy networks. The effort builds upon previous work on routing security and adapts the security assessments to the issues specific to RPL. With the threat model, the security objectives and required services are identified. These assessments then provide the basis of the security recommendations for incorporation into RPL.
